remarks: Prove that two objects are isomorphic by an explicit isomorphism. (Contributed by AV, 4-Apr-2020.)
statement:
cic.i $e |- I = ( Iso ` C ) $.
cic.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cic.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
cic.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
cic.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
cic.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X I Y ) ) $.
brcici $p |- ( ph -> X ( ~=c ` C ) Y ) $.
